name: 从零开始的勇者生活
description: "The Brave Life From Zero" is a strategy game that combines classic turn-based combat with pigeon tower climbing. The game has also innovatively added a hatred system. Players need to reasonably match the team lineup and character equipment to make the team stronger and defeat various unique enemies. The game does not have a low-level plot, and it starts directly when it comes up. The values are solid, there are many structural genres, and various genres can be cleared.
